Speaker Edition 2022

Discover the speakers and the topics or suggest your own topic for our next event

Speakers

Chris Coyler

Milwaukee, WI

9h30 R1

The All-Powerful Front-End Developer

Without servers, we'd have no way to share our creations with the world

Sara Soueidan

Lebanon

10h15 R1

Going Offline

You can re-visit my Web site even when you’re not connected to the Internet

Eric Meyer

Cleveland, OH

16h00 R1

Faux Grid Tracks

Is it possible to style the rows and columns of a [CSS] grid—the grid itself?

Lea Verou

Cambridge, MA

16h00 R2

Mavo

New approachable way to create Web applications

Shirley Wu

San Francisco, CA

09h30 R2

655 Frustrations Doing Data Visualization

Visualization teams spend more time visualizing than those on embedded teams

Luke Wroblewski

San Francisco, CA

11h30 R1

The Way of the Web

Science fiction is not about predicting the future, but about what we need to have a future

Nicolas Gallagher

San Francisco, CA

14h00 R1

Making SVG icon libraries for React apps

Using SVG is currently the best way to create icon libraries for apps

Rachel Andrew

Bristol, UK

15h00 R1

Making Things Better

Redefining the Technical Possibilities of CSS

Stephen Hay

Leeuwarden, NL

17h00 R1

Zero interface thinking

Everything we introduce has the potential to ruin everything. Ask: Is this absolutely necessary?

Paul Irish

Palo Alto, CA

10h30 R2

Developer Tooling, lighthouse

Auditing, performance metrics, and best practices for Progressive Web Apps

Nicole Sullivan

San Francisco, CA

11h30 R2

OOCSS code standards

Code conventions are important for the long-term maintainability of code

Brad Frost

Pittsburgh, PA

10h15 R2

Atomic Design

We can construct design systems in a more methodical way

The Las Vegas Convention Center

3150 Paradise Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

The Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), located adjacent to the Las Vegas Strip, encompasses approximately 3.2 million square feet with exhibit space of 2 million square feet and meeting space of nearly 250,000 square feet.
